long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bringing flexibility to how you watch YouTube.

Navigate to the YouTube video you want to watch, and then click the streamr extension icon to let it play in the embedded pop-up. Feel free to scroll the comments section too -- the video will stay up as long as you don't click away from the pop-up view.

Use the checkbox to decide if you want your video to autoplay the pop-up opens.
